title: Deadly Match
description: A retired assassin can’t find love, until he meets his match.     Almost dying puts some things in perspective for Reaper.  One, he is getting too old to be dodging bullets.  Two, who will mourn him when he is gone?  And three, he needs a legacy to inherit his collection of hockey cards.  Maybe it’s time to think of settling down, problem is, exactly where does a retired assassin meet a lady?  Charming Reaper Montgomery—the first—turns to a dating service to solve his problem, and finds himself intrigued by the owner, especially when his first date with her ends with bullets flying.  Between her secret past, and his killer resume, they’ll make a deadly match.
author: Eve Langlais
